dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, have you seen the news coming out of Kazakhstan today? Like, President Xi Jinping just arrived in Astana!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, have you seen the news coming out of Kazakhstan today? Like, President Xi Jinping just arrived in Astana!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, President Xi Jinping arrived in Kazakhstan for a two-day official visit at the invitation of President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, yeah, I saw a little bit. Uh, he's there for a visit, right? For a couple of days?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, yeah, I saw a little bit. Uh, he's there for a visit, right? For a couple of days?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, President Xi Jinping arrived in Kazakhstan for a two-day official visit...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! And, get this, Akorda actually published a video, and he was welcomed, like, super warmly by children right there at the airport terminal. It's really cute.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! And, get this, Akorda actually published a video, and he was welcomed, like, super warmly by children right there at the airport terminal. It's really cute.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Akorda has published a video of Chinese President Xi Jinping's arrival in Astana. At the capital's airport terminal, the head of state was warmly welcomed by children, citing Akorda.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Aww, by children? That's, um, really something. Did they, like, sing or something? Or just wave?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Aww, by children? That's, um, really something. Did they, like, sing or something? Or just wave?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Even better! They greeted him in *both* Kazakh and Chinese. Imagine that! And then, uh, there were traditional dances performed, too, representing both cultures.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Even better! They greeted him in both Kazakh and Chinese. Imagine that! And then, uh, there were traditional dances performed, too, representing both cultures.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The children greeted the distinguished guest in both Kazakh and Chinese. ... Traditional dances representing the cultures of both nations were also performed as part of the welcoming ceremony.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wow, so it was a whole, like, cultural spectacle, then. I mean, you know, the Akorda press service always gets those great shots and videos.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow, so it was a whole, like, cultural spectacle, then. I mean, you know, the Akorda press service always gets those great shots and videos.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. And this isn't just a quick stop. He's there for a two-day official visit, invited by President Tokayev himself.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. And this isn't just a quick stop. He's there for a two-day official visit, invited by President Tokayev himself.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, President Xi Jinping arrived in Kazakhstan for a two-day official visit at the invitation of President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Ah, so it's a big deal then. And isn't there, like, a big summit happening soon in Astana?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Ah, so it's a big deal then. And isn't there, like, a big summit happening soon in Astana?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On June 17, Astana will host the second "Central Asia - China" summit, with the participation of heads of state from across the region.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: You got it! On June 17th, Astana is hosting the second "Central Asia - China" summit. All the regional heads of state will be there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You got it! On June seventeenth, Astana is hosting the second Central Asia - China summit. All the regional heads of state will be there.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On June 17, Astana will host the second "Central Asia - China" summit, with the participation of heads of state from across the region.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, but did you catch the *other* detail? His plane was actually escorted by fighter jets into Astana!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, but did you catch the other detail? His plane was actually escorted by fighter jets into Astana!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Fighter jets escort Xi Jinping's plane to Astana

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Whoa, fighter jets? That's, um, quite the entrance, isn't it? Talk about making a statement of importance!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Whoa, fighter jets? That's, um, quite the entrance, isn't it? Talk about making a statement of importance!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right? It just really underscores, like, the significance of this whole visit, doesn't it? Very official.

dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. It really sets the tone, I think.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. It really sets the tone, I think.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, definitely. Sounds like a very significant few days ahead for regional relations and, uh, those two countries.
